content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserters at positions (1.5, -0.5), (3.5, -0.5), (-0.5, 1.5), (1.5, 2.5), and (3.5, 2.5) for feeding coal into the furnaces.

### Belt Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group with inputs at positions (x=-12.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-12.5, y=-52.5) and (x=-11.5, y=-49.5) to (x=-11.5, y=-51.5), and outputs at positions (x=-11.5, y=-52.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-52.5).
- Another belt group with inputs at position (x=-11.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-50.5) and outputs at position (x=-13.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-52.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting coal into inserters
- Ensure you have sufficient coal in your inventory before attempting to refuel inserters. Harvest coal regularly to maintain a steady supply.

### Furnace not working due to lack of ingredients
- Verify that the stone furnaces have a continuous supply of iron ore to avoid interruptions in the smelting process. Regularly supply iron ore to the furnaces to keep them operational.

### Assertion errors related to furnace status
- Check the operational status of the furnaces regularly to ensure they are working as intended. Address any warnings or errors related to furnace operations promptly.
